name: Math Climb
description:
Math Climb - Climb up but don't forget the Math!

Chase the highscore in this amazing addictive endless climber video game.
How high can you climb?

Addicting Gameplay

Easy and addicting gameplay in this amazing doodled math theme endless climber video game. Just tap the screen to climb from floor to floor. Try to hit the blue fields, the blue fields will add life points and the red will subtract life points. Try to avoid the red obstacles and collect the blue obstacles on the floors. Have fun with Math Climb and beat the highscore!

Supported Languages:
  • English
  • Deutsch
  • Español
  • Français
Play Offline

Do you want to play Math Climb whenever and wherever you want?
The mobile version does not require an internet connection.
